name: updatenpmpackages
description: A Node.js package to automate updating npm packages with dependency resolution and testing.

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepare-readme && npm run build

author: Manish Shrestha

readme.title: updatenpmpackages
readme.description: `updatenpmpackages` is a Node.js package that automates the process of updating outdated npm packages in a project. It resolves dependencies, runs tests, and provides a detailed summary of updates and failures.
features: Resolves dependencies and updates packages in the correct order.
Supports safe mode to test updates before applying them.
Provides a detailed summary of updated and failed packages.
Supports multiple passes to ensure all packages are updated.
readme.installation:
Install the package globally using npm:

```bash
npm install -g updatenpmpackages
```
